hero.core_tension: Choose urgent, narrow-window promotions that drive visits without collapsing margin across the whole season.
hero.setting: Backroom planning table overlooking a retail floor with a visible Nov 242 Dec 08 window on a wall calendar.
hero.persona: Head of Retail (operator) collaborating with Head of Partnerships (studio lead).
hero.action: Operator marks the Nov 242 Dec 08 window and pins a 'bundle + partner' activation to that date range.
hero.urgency_symbol: Stacked calendar tiles with the target window elevated and a short numeric countdown badge.
props: bundle mockups (discounted entry SKU + full-price add-on)
partner logo tiles and a small inventory tag
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting: confident highlights on the calendar and bundle, soft negative space around figures.
hero.alt: Head of Retail and Partnerships pin a Nov 242 Dec 08 bundle test on the calendar

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings for time buckets (pre-window, Nov 242 Dec 08, post-window) with radiating arcs showing promo intensity.
elements: tokens for store visits sized by footfall
arcs annotated with early_window_share and event_cpa values
paths showing buyer flow from entry SKU to add-on purchase
legend noting 'Instrument early-window share' and 'QR redemption checkpoints'
signal_map.motion: Flow from outer rings into the Nov 242 Dec 08 ring, with thicker paths where paired promotions raise conversion_rate and partner_value.
signal_map.palette: Matte neutrals with confident highlights on the target window; tactile materials like paper and brass pins to suggest measurement and craft.
signal_map.alt: Head of Retail reads a rings map showing early_window_share and event_cpa for a Nov 242 Dec 08 activation

case_studies.scene: In-store co-branded pop-up where a low-priced entry SKU is paired with a full-price service add-on sold at checkout.
case_studies.moment: A store manager reviews uplift in paired sales after introducing a brand	7brand bundle tied to an anchor product.
case_studies.persona: Store Manager testing brand	7brand bundle and upsell scripting.
props: pop-up pedestal with two stacked SKUs
POS screen showing bundle conversion vs baseline
partner signage with QR redemption sticker
case_studies.lighting: Clean editorial key light on the bundle, softer fill behind staff to keep product readable.
case_studies.alt: Store Manager reviews conversion_rate lift from a brand	7brand bundle test

case_studies.scene: Control vs treatment shelf test: one aisle runs a limited-quantity discount week (Nov 242 Dec 08), the adjacent aisle uses targeted add-on messaging without sitewide markdowns.
case_studies.moment: Regional Merchandiser checks early-window share and event CPA differences on a tablet dashboard after day three.
case_studies.persona: Regional Merchandiser running early-window share instrumentation and CPA caps.
props: tablet dashboard showing early_window_share by promo type
case_studies.lighting: Sharp editorial rim light on the tablet and shelf tags, neutral background to emphasize metrics.
case_studies.alt: Regional Merchandiser monitors early_window_share and event_cpa across control and limited-quantity tests
